author: theoklitosBam7
message:
docs: Change lexical in security guide (#41016)

Change `onerror` attribute reference to `script` element reference
PR Close #41016

files.patch: @@ -94,7 +94,7 @@ vulnerability. For example, one could execute JavaScript in a following way: -Angular recognizes the value as unsafe and automatically sanitizes it, which removes the `onerror` attribute but keeps safe content such as the `` element. +Angular recognizes the value as unsafe and automatically sanitizes it, which removes the `script` element but keeps safe content such as the `` element.
